widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia Lawyer Directory.
config.description: We have revamped the "Create Your Profile & Join Justia Connect" page. Now, lawyers can easily access and understand all the benefits of joining the Justia Lawyer Directory right from the beginning of the process.

config.title: Justia Connect.
config.description: We've enhanced the Justia Lawyer Directory editing dashboard to highlight the advantages of becoming a Justia Connect Pro member, aiming to further strengthen our Justia Connect community.

config.title: IT Team.
config.description: We've been making progress on various server infrastructure projects while ensuring efficient handling of maintenance tasks. This month, we successfully completed a significant upgrade across all our application databases. This effort began last year and involved meticulous planning to prevent service interruptions for our users.

config.title: QA Team.
config.description: This month, we launched the initial version of a toolset aimed at streamlining the Jweb to Justia Elevate migration process. We will further enhance these tools to serve as quality checks for our websites in the future.

config.title: Justia Legal Jobs.
config.description: After our initial launch, we've been implementing several updates, notably enhancing the appearance and usability of mobile listing pages. These improvements are pivotal as they serve as a primary entry point for our users.
